sentences.en: From there, he joined the Treasury Department and began a meteoric rise through the bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 在那以后, 他进入了财政部,开始了平步青云的仕途.
下冰雹是一种大气现象.

sentences.en: His early career had been meteoric.
sentences.cn: 他的早期生涯平步青云。

sentences.en: If meteoric water does not evaporate or run overland, it may seep directly into the ground.
sentences.cn: 如果雨水不从陆地蒸发和流走的话, 就可能直接渗入地下.

sentences.en: In my mind, losing weight is just something meteoric.
sentences.cn: 在我眼中, 减肥不过是昙花一现的事情.

sentences.en: It is concluded that Zjinshan deposit formed mainly by the convective circulation of meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 认为该矿床主要由大气降水的环流形成.

sentences.en: Metallogenetic epoch was late Yanshanian and fluid derived from meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 成矿流体来源主要为大气降水.

sentences.en: Ore - forming fluid rooted in the deep crust mixed with meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 成矿流体来源于地壳深部和后期大气降水的加入.

sentences.en: Scientists found the celestial origin of the meteoric shower.
sentences.cn: 科学家发现了那场流星雨的太空源.

sentences.en: The apparent celestial origin of a meteoric shower.
sentences.cn: '流星'.''''.'群'. ''的辐射点明显的流星雨太空光源.

sentences.en: The deposit middle temperature meteoric hydrothermal ore deposit.
sentences.cn: 矿床属大气降水低温热液型矿床.

sentences.en: The main ore fluid was magma water mixed with meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 成矿流体是以岩浆水为主,混有古大气水的混合流体.

sentences.en: The meteoric origin of geothermal water in study area is evidenced by its environmental isotope composition.
sentences.cn: 摘要环境同位素研究结果表明,研究区地热水为大气降水成因.

sentences.en: The regional deep fractures are main conduit of ore fluid which is dominated by meteoric water.
sentences.cn: 区域性深大断裂是成矿热循环的主通道,成矿流体以大气降水为主,有部分岩浆流体参与成矿.

words.tran_cn: 流星；[气象] 大气现象
